```{r}
#| label: load-libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```


```{r}
#| label: read-data
cdc <- read_csv('diabetes-cdc.csv')

cdc_balanced <- read_csv('diabetes-cdc-balanced.csv')
```


```{r}
#| label: eda


cdc |> 
  mutate(Diabetes_012 = factor(Diabetes_012,
                          levels = c(0, 1, 2),
                          labels = c('No Diabetes',
                                     'Prediabetes',
                                     'Diabetes'))) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = Diabetes_012)) +
  geom_bar()


cdc_balanced |> 
  mutate()
```
